verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> it is For <S%H251>brothers<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H3162>unity!<s%>

It is like the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3381>Coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H2206>beard,<s%> [Even] Aaron's <S%H2206>beard,<s%> <S%H3381>Coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of his <S%H4060>robes.<s%>

It is like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> <S%H3381>Coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> For <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> â€“ <S%H9132>life<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
